name: Forbidden Fruit (davidwahrhaftig, awpunzalan, pjsmith97)
description:
Forbidden Fruit is a two player competitive fantasy game. Each player plays as an amateur magician, both trying-out to be an apprentice to Merlin the wizard. The task they must endure lays inside of an enchanted witch's homeland, filled with the presence of her minions and magical creatures. Each player must collect the mystical fruits before time runs out, dodging the wreck of the witch and the disruptions from their opponent. 


Joystick Controls:

Can be played with standard controllers (e.g. PS4, Xbox, etc...)

Move: Left Stick

Rotate: Right Stick

Jump: X

Camera Flip: Square

Shoot: R2

Resist: L1 / R1

Pause / Menu: Options


Keyboard Controls: 

Pause / Menu: ESC

Red Player:

Move: W / A / S / D

Jump: 1

Shoot: 2

Rotate and Resist: A / D

Blue Player:

Move: Arrow Keys

Jump: J

Shoot: K

Rotate and Resist: Left Key / Right Key
